meta.name: title
meta.content: AVA Hollywood at La Pietra Place - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.h2: Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA.
div.span: The reasons to love Hollywood are endless. Which is why we chose to be in the heart of it all. AVA is a brand new living space ready for you to make it yours. Our thoughtfully designed layouts feature kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, hard-surface plank flooring and in-unit washer/dryers. Select apartments feature sliding barn doors for customizing your space. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Hang out with friends in the chill spaces with lounge seating and WiFi, or feel the burn in the fully-loaded, 5,000 sq. ft. fitness center. Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA Hollywood at La Pietra Place. So, what are you waiting for? Dive in and make it yours.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Living at AVA Hollywood at La Pietra Place
div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Affordable homes for rent available through the affordable housing program for qualifying future residents.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes are designed with sustainability in mind, so you can live in an environment that’s lighter on the planet and its resources.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Pet friendly community with a WAG Spa and WAG Pet Park View more details
EV outlets and EV charging stations View more details
Urban scheme apartments with sliding barn doors, open concept closets, gear walls, and accent chalkboard walls

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Give us a shout to learn more about AVA. We know you’ll like what we have to say.
div.div: 6677 Santa Monica Boulevard • Los Angeles, CA 90038 • (323) 922-5304 • (323) 310-2483

","description":"The reasons to love Hollywood are endless. Which is why we chose to be in the heart of it all. AVA is a brand new living space ready for you to make it yours. Our thoughtfully designed layouts feature kitchens with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, hard-surface plank flooring and in-unit washer/dryers. Select apartments feature sliding barn doors for customizing your space. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, AVAConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Hang out with friends in the chill spaces with lounge seating and WiFi, or feel the burn in the fully-loaded, 5,000 sq. ft. fitness center. Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA Hollywood at La Pietra Place. So, what are you waiting for? Dive in and make it yours."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fTGuwjbLda23T","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/OOZS7JFGSFCF3MDFDSQ3VMWQUQ.jpg","imgAlt":null,"furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0f4NGpubLda2MR","customFields":{"title":"Authentic.
